name: Food Mash - Alpha
description:
Food Mash is a multiplayer champion shooter, with fantastic art, graphics, models, and networking to provide you with a buttery smooth gameplay experience. The game features 4 game modes including Control The Salt, Death Match, First To 10 Kills, and Free For All. The four champions include Potassium Shooter, Zesty Lemon Attack, Eggcellent Shooter, and The Three Peaketeers with more champions coming soon. The game also features a cartoonish art and game style to therefore be more suitable to younger children, with fast paced action that still entertains all ages.

-----------------------------------------------

Controls

Left Mouse / Q  -  Shoot

Right Mouse / Left Ctrl  -  Aim

Left Shift  -  Run

WASD/←↑→↓ -  Move

-----------------------------------------------

... Im a solo developer, so me.
